Name: Purrate Adventure: Volcano Isle
About the game: ''That's Gotta be the Best Pirate I've Ever Seen!'' Purrate Adventure is a 3D Platforming Cat Pirate Collect-A-Thon Adventure! Play as Mallow, the Cat Pirate! grabbing anything he can get his paws on. Explore & Plunder a large Volcanic Island in search of Coins, Gems, Crowns, and the 5 hidden Talismans! Platform across the island using power-up combinations to cross a variety of obstacles! Use a Dynamic Map & Camera Mode to navigate the non-linear Isle. 15 Steam Achievements to Collect! Purrate Adventure: Volcano Isle is a project developed following player feedback closely. This has affected all the changes, fixes, and additions made to the game over the months leading to release.
